sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_3a969ae093b7311072a375dcebba10fd
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_members</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="u_members">u_user_referenceISEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_user_reference" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>createDummy</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
		var userRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		userRecord.initialize();

		userRecord.first_name = current.u_name;
		userRecord.employee_number = current.u_employee_code;
		userRecord.user_name = current.u_user_name;
		userRecord.active = current.u_active;
		var userID = userRecord.insert();

		current.u_user_reference = userRecord.sys_id;

		var roles = current.u_roles.toString().split(',');
		for(var i in roles)
		{
			gs.addInfoMessage("Added role "+roles[i]);
			var grRole = new GlideRecord("sys_user_has_role");
			grRole.intialize();
			grRole.user = userRecord.sys_id;
			grRole.role = roles[i];
			grRole.insert();
		}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-14 18:49:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3a969ae093b7311072a375dcebba10fd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>createDummy</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3a969ae093b7311072a375dcebba10fd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-16 09:03:57</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3a969ae093b7311072a375dcebba10fd"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_c1904636936fb11072a375dcebba105a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>updateManager</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[var current = new Object();
var previous = new Object();

current.team = "095b6169936f351072a375dcebba1088";
previous.team = "792ba1a9936f351072a375dcebba1060";

if(current.team != previous.team){
	var obj1 = new GlideRecord('u_teams');
	obj1.get(current.team);
	var name1 = obj1.getElement('u_manager');
	gs.print(name1);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-09 06:39:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>c1904636936fb11072a375dcebba105a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateManager</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c1904636936fb11072a375dcebba105a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-09 07:08:41</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Assign write operation to the Manager if he belongs to that particular team.</description><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>u_assignments.*</name><operation display_value="write">write</operation><script><![CDATA[permission = function(){
	var userID = gs.getUserID();
	gs.info("tms"+ userID + " " + current.u_team.u_manager.u_user_reference);
	if(current.u_team.u_manager.u_user_reference == userID)
	{
		gs.info("tms " + current.u_team.u_manager.u_user_reference == userID);
		return true;
	}
	else{
		return false;
	}
};

answer = permission();]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-16 10:02:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>308c428d933bb11072a375dcebba10cc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_assignments.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_308c428d933bb11072a375dcebba10cc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-17 05:35:16</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_1d97de53937b711072a375dcebba10a5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.userManagerInfo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>pass manager info using the parameter passed.</description><name>userManagerInfo</name><script><![CDATA[var userManagerInfo = Class.create();
userManagerInfo.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	managerInfo: function (userID)
	{
		var grObj = new GlideRecord('sys_user');  // --->> avoid this approach(dot-walking), better one is the above
		grObj.get(userID);
		var mUser = new Object();
		var fname = grObj.getElement('manager.first_name');
		var lname = grObj.getElement('manager.last_name');
		mUser.name = fname + lname;
		mUser.phone = grObj.getElement('manager.mobile_phone');
		mUser.email = grObj.getElement('manager.email');
		gs.print(mUser.name);
		gs.print(mUser.phone);
		gs.print(mUser.email);
	},
    type: 'userManagerInfo'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-23 08:17:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>1d97de53937b711072a375dcebba10a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>userManagerInfo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1d97de53937b711072a375dcebba10a5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-23 08:17:30</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_e61ed4009340021072a375dcebba10cc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="DELETE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Allow read for all fields in u_assignments, for users with role tms_super, and if the ACL script returns true.</description><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>u_assignments.*</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[check = function(){
	var userID = gs.getUserID();
	if(current.u_team_member.u_user_reference == userID)
	{
		return true;
	}
	else{
		return false;
	}
};

answer = check();]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-25 06:41:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>e61ed4009340021072a375dcebba10cc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_assignments.*</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_e61ed4009340021072a375dcebba10cc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-25 07:07:42</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

	// Add your code here

	// if(current.u_team != previous.u_team){
		var obj1 = new GlideRecord('u_teams');
		obj1.get(current.u_team);
		var name1 = obj1.getElement('u_manager');
		current.u_manager = name1;
	// }
	// gs.addErrorMessage("Manager needs to be changed when team is changed");
	// current.setAbortAction(true);

// var gdt = new GlideDateTime();
// var gdt1 = GlideDateTime('2015-07-24 18:58:00');
// var gdt2 = GlideDateTime('2015-07-24 19:01:00');
// var duration2 = GlideDateTime.subtract(gdt1, gdt2);
// gs.print(duration2);

// Assuming you have a Glidevar currentDateTime = new GlideDateTime();

// Get the time in seconds since the epoch
// var currentDateTime = new GlideDateTime();
// var currentTimeInSeconds = Math.floor(currentDateTime.getNumericValue() / 1000);

// // Output the result
// gs.info("Current Time in Seconds: " + currentTimeInSeconds);

var startDate = new GlideDateTime('2024-01-01 12:00:00');
var endDate = new GlideDateTime('2024-01-02 18:30:00');

var hoursDifference = gs.dateDiff(startDate, endDate, true)/(60*60);
gs.info("Hours Difference: " + hoursDifference);


]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-01 12:39:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>4072f1d293c4021072a375dcebba1042</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>workDone</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4072f1d293c4021072a375dcebba1042</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-01 13:46:27</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_teams</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ActionsAfterManagerChange</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	if(current.u_manager != previous.u_manager)
	{
		gs.eventQueue("onChangeManager", current, current.u_manager, previous.u_manager);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-01 17:12:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cb40365a93c8021072a375dcebba1090</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ActionsAfterManagerChange</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cb40365a93c8021072a375dcebba1090</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-06 05:23:03</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cb40365a93c8021072a375dcebba1090"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_623fb5ad9340021072a375dcebba10f1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>User will be able to act as manager.</description><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>u_assignments</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[check = function(){
	var userID = gs.getUserID();
	if(gs.hasRole(gs.getProperty("tms.assignment.superuser")))
	{
		var grObj = new GlideRecord('u_members');
		grObj.addQuery("u_user_reference", userID);
		grObj.query();
		grObj.next();
		if(current.u_team == grObj.u_team_name)
		{
			return true;
		}
		else
		{
			return false;
		}
	}
	else{
		if(current.u_team_member.u_user_reference == userID)
		{
			return true;
		}
		else
		{
			return false;
		}
	}
	
};

answer = check();]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-30 05:43:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>623fb5ad9340021072a375dcebba10f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_assignments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_623fb5ad9340021072a375dcebba10f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-30 07:36:34</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_security_acl_e5f0cdb593f3311072a375dcebba10a8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_security_acl"><sys_security_acl action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><admin_overrides>true</admin_overrides><advanced>true</advanced><condition/><description>Manager will be shown only his team</description><local_or_existing>Local</local_or_existing><name>u_assignments</name><operation display_value="read">read</operation><script><![CDATA[check = function(){
	var userID = gs.getUserID();
	if(current.u_team.u_manager.u_user_reference == userID)
	{
		return true;
	}
	else{
		return false;
	}
};

answer = check();]]></script><security_attribute/><sys_class_name>sys_security_acl</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-18 09:41:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>e5f0cdb593f3311072a375dcebba10a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>u_assignments</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_security_acl_e5f0cdb593f3311072a375dcebba10a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-30 06:23:15</sys_updated_on><type display_value="record">record</type></sys_security_acl></record_update>

var gr = new GlideRecord("u_members");
gr.get("7543a28993bbb11072a375dcebba1088");

{

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-16 08:51:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>4006224d93bbb11072a375dcebba10a2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>createUsers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_4006224d93bbb11072a375dcebba10a2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-16 08:55:04</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_members</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>updateUser</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var fields = ['u_name', 'u_employee_code', 'u_user_name'];

	var obj = new Object();
	obj['u_name'] = "first_name";
	obj['u_employee_code'] = "employee_number";
	obj['u_user_name'] = "user_name";

	var userRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	userRecord.query();
	for(var i in fields)
	{
		if(current.i != userRecord.obj[i])
		{
			userRecord.obj[i] = current.i;
		}
	}
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-16 06:29:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c4a9390993f7b11072a375dcebba1061</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateUser</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c4a9390993f7b11072a375dcebba1061</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-16 06:36:25</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c4a9390993f7b11072a375dcebba1061"/></record_update>

		userRecord.deleteRecord();
	}

assig.get('d2f1d54d93d7f11072a375dcebba1050');

if(assig.u_team.u_manager.toString() == 'ee2e854993d7f11072a375dcebba1093')
{
	gs.print("Correct");
}
else{
	gs.print("Fail");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-16 07:28:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>cc8d86cd933bb11072a375dcebba10b3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>changeManager</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_cc8d86cd933bb11072a375dcebba10b3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-16 07:29:05</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_c1896e5293c8021072a375dcebba1003
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>onChangeManager</event_name><name>onChangeManagerAction</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[var grobj = new GlideRecord('u_assignments');
grobj.addQuery("u_team", current.sys_id);
grobj.query();
while(grobj.hasNext())
{
	grobj.next();
	gs.info("Manager changed from " + grobj.u_manager.u_name + " to " + current.u_manager.u_name);
	gs.info("Member is " + grobj.u_team_member.u_name);
	grobj.u_manager = current.u_manager;
	grobj.update();
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-01 17:15:55</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c1896e5293c8021072a375dcebba1003</sys_id><sys_mod_count>26</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onChangeManagerAction</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_c1896e5293c8021072a375dcebba1003</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-06 06:37:26</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a9e8b9d6936b311072a375dcebba10d4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.EmployeeInfo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Returns information about employee in JSON format.
Parameters : Employee Code.</description><name>EmployeeInfo</name><script><![CDATA[var EmployeeInfo = Class.create();
EmployeeInfo.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	dataReceive: function(eid){
		try{
			var grObj = new GlideRecord('u_members');
			grObj.addQuery('u_employee_code', '=', eid);
			grObj.query();
			var jsonObj = new Object();
			if(grObj.hasNext())
			{
				grObj.next();
				jsonObj.name = grObj.getValue('u_name');
				jsonObj.team = grObj.getValue('u_team_name');
				jsonObj.empCode = grObj.getValue('u_employee_code');

				var dob = grObj.getValue('u_dob');
				var temp = new GlideDateTime(dob);
				var year = temp.getDisplayValueInternal().split('-')[0];

				var myGlideDateTime = new GlideDateTime();
				var currentYear = myGlideDateTime.getYearLocalTime();

				jsonObj.age = year - currentYear;

				return jsonObj;
			}
		}
		catch(e){
			gs.print(e);
		}
	},

    type: 'EmployeeInfo'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-07 16:47:25</sys_created_on><sys_id>a9e8b9d6936b311072a375dcebba10d4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EmployeeInfo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a9e8b9d6936b311072a375dcebba10d4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-07 17:12:46</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_424828d69340021072a375dcebba10ea
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_assignments</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>workDone</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gdt = new GlideDateTime();

	if(current.u_state == 1 && previous.u_state == 0)
	{
		current.u_start_date = gdt;
		current.u_hold_date = gdt;
		current.u_duration = new GlideDuration("0");
		gs.addInfoMessage("Project Started on " + current.u_start_date );
	}
	else if(current.u_state == 2 && previous.u_state == 1)
	{
		var duration = current.u_duration.getGlideObject().getNumericValue() +  parseInt(gs.dateDiff(current.u_hold_date, gdt, true), 10)*1000;
		current.u_duration = new GlideDuration(duration);
		gs.addInfoMessage("Project Paused on "+ gdt);
	}
	else if(current.u_state == 1 && previous.u_state == 2)
	{
		current.u_hold_date = gdt;
		gs.addInfoMessage("Hold Ended on "+ current.u_hold_date);
	}
	else if(current.u_state == 3 && previous.u_state == 1)
	{
		duration = current.u_duration.getGlideObject().getNumericValue() +  parseInt(gs.dateDiff(current.u_hold_date, gdt, true), 10)*1000;
		current.u_duration = new GlideDuration(duration);
		current.u_end_date = gdt;
		gs.addInfoMessage("Project Completed on "+current.u_duration);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-01 09:18:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>424828d69340021072a375dcebba10ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>29</sys_mod_count><sys_name>workDone</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_424828d69340021072a375dcebba10ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-02 06:37:07</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=424828d69340021072a375dcebba10ea"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_c668c249933bb11072a375dcebba10ea
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description/><name>updateUsers</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[var fields = ['u_name', 'u_employee_code', 'u_user_name'];

var obj = new Object();
obj['u_name'] = "first_name";
obj['u_employee_code'] = "employee_number";
obj['u_user_name'] = "user_name";

var userRecord = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
var userRecord2 = new GlideRecord('u_members');
userRecord.get();

userRecord.query();
userRecord2.query();
// userRecord.next();
// userRecord2.next();

for(var i in fields)
{
	gs.print(userRecord.i);

	// gs.print(userRecord2.i);
	// gs.print(userRecord.obj[i]);
	// if(userRecord2.i != userRecord.obj[i])
	// {
	// 	userRecord.obj[i] = userRecord2.i;
	// }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-16 06:44:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>c668c249933bb11072a375dcebba10ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateUsers</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_c668c249933bb11072a375dcebba10ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-16 10:06:08</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_duration" table="u_assignments"><active>true</active><array>false</array><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current){
	var start = new GlideDateTime(current.u_start_date);
	var end = new GlideDateTime(current.u_end_time);

	var durationMillis = end.getNumericValue() - start.getNumericValue();

	// var durationDays = durationMillis / (1000 * 60 * 60 *24);

	// current.u_duration = durationDays;
	current.u_duration = durationMillis;

	return current;
})(current);]]></calculation><choice/><choice_field/><choice_table/><column_label>Duration</column_label><comments/><create_roles/><default_value/><defaultsort/><delete_roles/><dependent/><dependent_on_field/><display>false</display><dynamic_creation>false</dynamic_creation><dynamic_creation_script/><dynamic_default_value/><dynamic_ref_qual/><element>u_duration</element><element_reference>false</element_reference><foreign_database/><formula/><function_definition/><function_field>false</function_field><internal_type display_value="">glide_duration</internal_type><mandatory>false</mandatory><max_length>64</max_length><name>u_assignments</name><next_element/><primary>false</primary><read_only>false</read_only><read_roles/><reference/><reference_cascade_rule/><reference_floats>false</reference_floats><reference_key/><reference_qual/><reference_qual_condition/><reference_type/><spell_check>false</spell_check><staged>false</staged><sys_class_name>sys_dictionary</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-21 10:22:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>4fc009fc93d7b11072a375dcebba10c3</sys_id><sys_name>Duration</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_dictionary_u_assignments_u_duration</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-01 14:13:06</sys_updated_on><table_reference>false</table_reference><text_index>false</text_index><unique>false</unique><use_dependent_field>false</use_dependent_field><use_dynamic_default>false</use_dynamic_default><use_reference_qualifier>simple</use_reference_qualifier><virtual>false</virtual><virtual_type>script</virtual_type><widget/><write_roles/><xml_view>false</xml_view></sys_dictionary></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_27591617937b711072a375dcebba101d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><before>false</before><description>This server side script calls the script include and pass user's sys_id to it. This script include return a user's manager info as a JSON Object.</description><name>infoManager</name><record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback><script><![CDATA[// var userID = '2c7d121b937b711072a375dcebba10b9';
// var grObj = new GlideRecord('sys_user');  // --->> avoid this approach(dot-walking), better one is the above
// var m1 = grObj.get(userID);
// var m2 = grObj.getElement('manager.first_name').toString();
// gs.print(typeof(m2));
// gs.print(m2);

var obj = new global.userManagerInfo();

gs.print(data);

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4ed1a65f937b711072a375dcebba10c0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.userManagerInfo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>This script is used  to take parameter from client scipt (sys_id of user) and  return that user's manager name, phone no. and email as a JSON Object.
This script can work on both client side(Client Script) and on server side(Fix Script and Background Script).</description><name>userManagerInfo</name><script><![CDATA[var userManagerInfo = Class.create();
userManagerInfo.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	
	managerInfo : function(userID){

		if(!userID)
		{
			userID = this.getParameter('sysparm_param');
		}
		
		var grObj = new GlideRecord('sys_user');  // --->> avoid this approach(dot-walking), better one is the above
		grObj.get(userID);

		var mUser = new Object();
		var fname = grObj.getElement('manager.first_name');
		var lname = grObj.getElement('manager.last_name');

		mUser.name = fname + lname;
		mUser.phone = grObj.getElement('manager.mobile_phone').toString();
		mUser.email = grObj.getElement('manager.email').toString();
		return JSON.stringify(mUser);
	},
    type: 'userManagerInfo'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-23 08:20:14</sys_created_on><sys_id>4ed1a65f937b711072a375dcebba10c0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>userManagerInfo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4ed1a65f937b711072a375dcebba10c0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-24 08:21:02</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_entry"><sys_transform_entry action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choice_action>create</choice_action><coalesce>false</coalesce><coalesce_case_sensitive>false</coalesce_case_sensitive><coalesce_empty_fields>false</coalesce_empty_fields><date_format>yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss</date_format><map display_value="People Data">8cb54bb093af711072a375dcebba1028</map><reference_value_field/><source_field>[Script]</source_field><source_script><![CDATA[answer = (function transformEntry(source) {

	// Add your code here
	var fname = source.u_first_name;
	var lname = source.u_last_name;
	var uname = lname + fname.charAt(0).toUpperCase();
	return uname;

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>u_people_data</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-03 06:17:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>071603b493af711072a375dcebba1049</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_071603b493af711072a375dcebba1049</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nirmal.gharpure</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-03 07:12:42</sys_updated_on><target_field>user_name</target_field><target_table>sys_user</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>
